lead_paragraph: Bayer said its strategy chief, Werner Baumann, will succeed its chief executive, Marijn Dekkers, on May 1.

headline.print_headline: Bayer’s Strategy Chief Will Succeed Chief Executive
headline.main: Bayer’s Strategy Chief Will Succeed Chief Executive

snippet: Bayer said its strategy chief, Werner Baumann, will succeed its chief executive, Marijn Dekkers, on May 1.
abstract: Bayer announces strategy chief Werner Baumann will succeed chief executive Marijn Dekkers in May.
